dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.perf.sls.ServiceLevelSpecParameter
dataStructure.description:
A variable whose value is used to determine compliance with a ServiceLevelObjective.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ServiceLevelSpecParameter

child.name: serviceParmPerspective
child.description:
A string that specifies whether the ServiceLevelSpecParameter represents a single user instance parameter or a parameter that represents an aggregation.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: serviceParmPerspective

child.name: serviceParmCategory
child.description:
A string that specifies whether the ServiceLevelSpecParameter is technology specific, service specific, or technology/service independent

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: serviceParmCategory

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period of time during with the ServiceLevelSpecParameter is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: serviceLevelObjective
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association ServiceLevelObjectiveExpressedUsing

This association end is optional
child.label: serviceLevelObjective
